TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LineBreak extends System.Windows.Documents.Inline

Docs.summary: An inline flow content element that causes a line break to occur in flow content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use LineBreak to start a new line of text. Unlike other <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Inline> objects, LineBreak does not allow child elements.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new, default instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.LineBreak"> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer insertionPosition) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"> specifying an insertion position at which to insert the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LineBreak> element after it is created, or `null` for no automatic insertion.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.LineBreak"> class, and inserts the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.LineBreak"> at a specified position.
